item.description:
COST: $35 pp

Hello Everyone -

Let's try to get in a few more kayaking trips before we have to say goodbye to summer! We're gonna head back to the Nantasket Beach area in Hull on the Weir River. Easy to find, plenty of parking!!! It's a quite 3 hour paddle, great for beginners and beyond and we'll take a break and stop for a snack. Those of you who joined us for the Hingham Harbor paddle, we won't need to transport our boats anywhere. Easy in, easy out ;-)

DETAILS:

Right now open for 1 guest but please send an email and ask if you'd like others to join. If there's plenty of room - the more the merrier ;-)

Please bring:

  • water shoes
  • a snack/lunch and beverage
  • plenty of water
  • sunscreen
  • a hat
  • No alcohol
  • a smile for a good time


Bringing your own boat:

  • No cost
  • need your own PFD, paddle and whistle



WEATHER:
Be sure to check your email either Friday night or Saturday morning for cancellation notice from me. Event will be cancelled due to bad weather.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to kayaks and/or kayak equipment. Personal flotation devices (PFDs) are required for all participants.

Directions:
(the Marina across from the Nantasket Carrousel)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Another Kayaking Adventure!!!
